item.title: Seoul Bike Rental Prediction
item.description: hourly rental data along with weather data. the training set is comprised of the first 20 days of each month, while the test set is the 21th to the end of the month. predict the total count of bikes rented during each hour covered by the test set, using only information available prior to the rental period. link for kaggle notebook !

item.title: Car Crashes' Severity Prediction
item.description: predict the Severity of a car crash given info about the crash, e.g., location. link for kaggle notebook !
